      • filter

        @Deprecated
public FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec filter(org.springframework.integration.file.filters.FileListFilter<java.io.File> filter,
                                                        boolean preventDuplicates)
        Deprecated. since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
        Configure the filter; if preventDuplicates == true, the filter is combined with an AcceptOnceFileListFilter in a CompositeFileListFilter.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter.
        preventDuplicates - true to prevent duplicates.
        Returns:
        the spec.
        See Also:
        CompositeFileListFilter, AcceptOnceFileListFilter

public FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec preventDuplicatesFilter(boolean preventDuplicates)
        Deprecated. since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
        Configure an AcceptOnceFileListFilter if preventDuplicates == true, otherwise nothing changed.
        Parameters:

        the spec.
